name: @asgardeo/choreo-react-express
description: React and Express based sample fullstack app to demonstrate Asgardeo / WSO2 Identity Server Auth React SDK usage

scripts.prebuild: curr_dir=$(pwd) && yarn run install:client && cd $curr_dir && yarn run install:server
scripts.build: curr_dir=$(pwd) && yarn run build:client && cd $curr_dir && yarn run build:server
